annotations.description: Another installment of our exploration of Kara Newman’s book Night Cap and another installment of our exploration into the many variations of the Old Fashion...
annotations.title: Nightcap: Flapjack Old Fashioned

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Aged Rum
.75oz (22.5ml) Sweet Vermouth
.25oz (7.5ml) Maple Syrup
2 dashes Angostura Bitters
Star Anise Garnish

Stir over ice. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e_LGkd9N3SU
title: Flapjack Old Fashioned
